sentences.en: As Mei walked slowly from the room, Jui - chueh gazed after her thoughtfully.
sentences.cn: 她慢步走出房门的时候, 瑞珏 还两次抬头看她的背影.
丹尼尔若有所思地点了点头。
他若有所思地摸着下巴.

sentences.en: He listened thoughtfully, interjecting only the odd word.
sentences.cn: 他仔细地听着，只是偶尔插句话。

sentences.en: He looked at the picture thoughtfully.
sentences.cn: 他沉思地看着那张照片.

sentences.en: I strolled up and down thoughtfully before calling a taxi.
sentences.cn: 我踱来踱去仔细思量后叫了一辆出租车。

sentences.en: Millson regarded her thoughtfully. Perhaps she was right.
sentences.cn: 米尔森若有所思地注视着她。或许她是对的。
她若有所思地抚摩着下巴。

sentences.en: She stared thoughtfully at the Englishman across the table.
sentences.cn: 她若有所思地盯着桌子对面的那个英国人.

sentences.en: She stared thoughtfully into the distance.
She turned round and regarded him thoughtfully.
sentences.cn: 她回过身来,沉思地望了望他.
蓝眼睛若有所思地眯了起来.

sentences.en: The man pulled thoughtfully at his pipe before commenting on our proposal.
sentences.cn: 那人若有所思地吸了口烟,然后就我们的建议发表自己的见解.

sentences.en: The man pulled thoughtfully at his pipe.
sentences.cn: 那人若有所思地吸了烟.

words.tran_cn: 思考的；思想的；有理性的；好思考的
思考；思想；想法；意见；见解
想，思考；认为（think的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 沉思地，深虑地，亲切地，体贴地
